Name: Mississippi Schnapper
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Orange predominates with peach-like sweetness balanced by whiskey and lime.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 1999 by Dan Cottle at Velvet in Manchester, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Mississippi Schnapper contains 173 calories
